definition: to feel/to move/to touch/to affect/feeling/emotion/(suffix) sense of ~
grateful and seeking to repay the kindness (idiom)

sentences.english: Jeff Sr. and Marge thanked me, but I was the grateful one.
sentences.chinese: 老杰弗和玛吉感谢我，倒是我要向他们感恩才是。

sentences.english: Her selection is still to be formalized and will not be announced until after Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 在感恩节结束之前，希拉里不会正式宣布其决定。

sentences.english: Welcome to Da Ai Headlines. I'm Leeway Cai. Thank you for joining us.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎收看大爱英语新闻，我是蔡力薇，感恩您的加入。

sentences.english: He should be grateful to the Fuehrer that he still has private property.
sentences.chinese: 他应该为自己还拥有私有财产而对元首感恩戴德。

sentences.english: Ripples undulating, that's damp thanksgiving of Ba River.
sentences.chinese: 涟漪泳动，那是巴河湿漉漉的感恩。

sentences.english: The "First Thanksgiving" in 1621 was actually a harvest festival.
sentences.chinese: 第一次感恩节发生在1621年，为了庆祝农业丰收。

sentences.english: These norms are a concrete expression of the authentically ecclesial nature of the Eucharist;
sentences.chinese: 这些规范具体表达出感恩祭的真正教会特性。

sentences.english: Zhong Kui married off his little sister to Du Ping in return.
sentences.chinese: 钟馗为了感恩，把妹妹嫁给了杜平。

sentences.english: Make you a grateful person by knowing people's needs around the world.
sentences.chinese: 报纸使您因为知道世上人的需要而懂得惜福感恩。

sentences.english: Perhaps you remember during your gratitude session.
sentences.chinese: 也许你在感恩课时才想起。

sentences.english: Now I would like to give you some details every second of-around Thyourksgiving Day in the United Sthlistings.
sentences.chinese: 现在我想给你们详明谈谈美国的感恩节。

sentences.english: The broadening views of family are expected to have an impact at Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 放宽了的家庭观念估计会对感恩节产生影响。

sentences.english: At the same time, we have to drink from the source, respecting teachers, Thanksgiving.
sentences.chinese: 同时，我们还要饮水思源，尊师感恩。

sentences.english: A：I took my little sister to see the Thanksgiving Day parade before dinner.
sentences.chinese: 晚饭前我带我的小妹去看了感恩节游行。

sentences.english: Except for Thanksgiving turkey, it's hard to find a typically "American" food. The United States is a land of immigrants.
sentences.chinese: 除了感恩节火鸡以外，挺难找到典型的美国食物。

sentences.english: A deep feeling of contentment and appreciation arose.
sentences.chinese: 一种深深的知足和感恩心油然生起。

definition: to recall fondly/to remember with emotion
to show concern and care for
care/solicitude/to show care for/concerned about/attentive to
compassion/kindness/care for others/love/CL:片[pian4]/charity (bazaar, golf day etc)/heart (the symbol ♥)
